# About
> [!CAUTION]
> **this repository is for testing and learning purposes only**

This program is based on [`Npcap`](https://npcap.com) developed for **learning and testing the work principles of Ethernet** on `Windows OS` , it is written in C++ and compiled with [`Microsoft Visual Studio Community Edition`](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/)![](https://camo.githubusercontent.) and `MSVC` compiler.  


The [`Npcap SDK`](https://npcap.com/download) is required for compilation.

---
This is my first repository for testing and learning [Git](https://git-scm.com/)![Git logo](https://img.shields.io/badge/GIT-E44C30?style=for-the-badge&logo=git&logoColor=white) and [Github](https://github.com)![Github](https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-181717?style=for-the-badge&logo=github&logoColor=white)<br/>

---
I'm a newbie :) :neutral_face: With no experience in project development, **this repository is for testing and learning purposes only**.
